alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 10:31AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CALLAHAN... SOUTHEASTERN JONES...SOUTHERN SHACKELFORD AND NORTHERN TAYLOR COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM CST... At 1031 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over View, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Wylie, Tye, Tuscola, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Lueders, Potosi, View, Hamby, Nugent, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Mccarty Lake, Camp Tonkawa, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600, and Hodges. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 273 and 300. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
